DOC.brief_summary: To administer MSDR® ( Musculoskeletal Disorder Reporting ) instrument document musculoskeletal profile patient chronic low back pain , prospective , non-randomized , multicenter treatment trial
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study : Non-Surgical Spinal Decompression Spinal Manipulative Therapy- Utilizing Quantifiable Musculoskeletal Functional Assessment Risk Analysis Tool ( MSDR® ) Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Must Informed Consent Signed Lumbar Disc Herniations 5mm without Sequestered Fragments Lumbar Disc Bulging Lumbar Degenerative Disc Disease ( mild moderate severity ) Nonpregnant Females Males suffer Chronic Low Back Pain 18 65 year age Segmental Dysfunction Secondary Dyskinesia Unresolved Nerve Entrapment Syndrome Patients must able comply study protocol Joint Fixation Syndrome Premenopausal Female Patients , exclude patient undergone hysterectomy , oophorectomy , tubal ligation , must one follow method contraception must negative serum urine bHCG pregnancy test perform within 48 hour initiate protocol specify treatment . Contraindications Spinal Manipulative Therapy Lumbar Canal Stenosis result significant neurological comprimise Any Spinal Cord Compression result significant neurological comprimise Cauda Equina Syndrome Infection Osteomyelitis > 65 year age History Back Neck Surgery Acute Arthritis Signs Symptoms Arterial Aneurysm History Active Cancer Bone Metastasis Widespread Staphyloccal and/or Strepococcal Infection Acute Gout Serious unstable medical illness cardiovascular , renal , respiratory , endocrine , gastrointestinal , psychiatric . Unstable Spondylosis , Spondylolisthesis , Spondylolysis Prior adverse experience Spinal Manipulation Therapy Uncontrolled Diabetic Neuropathy Gonorreal Spinal Arthritis Tuberculosis Bone Maligancy Metatasis Bone Excessive Spinal Osteoporosis Osteomalacia Ankylosis Syphlitic Articular PeriArticular Lesions Active Low Back Injury Resulting Motor Vehicle Accident Work Related Injury
